file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-28-01-04 - LAVATORY DOME LIGHT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL LAVATORY DOME LIGHT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the lavatory dome-light lamp and the lavatory dome-light assembly. B. The lavatory dome light is installed in the lavatory ceiling and permits the illumination of the lavatory. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY LAVATORY DOME-LIGHT LAMP - RE- ALL 33-28-01-000-801-A MOVAL LAVATORY DOME-LIGHT LAMP - INSTAL- ALL 33-28-01-400-801-A LATION LAVATORY DOME-LIGHT ASSEMBLY - ALL 33-28-01-000-802-A REMOVAL LAVATORY DOME-LIGHT ASSEMBLY - ALL 33-28-01-400-802-A INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-28-01 Page 1 of 13 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-28-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. LAVATORY DOME-LIGHT LAMP - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to remove the lavatory-dome light lamp. (2) On aircraft PRE-MOD. S.B.145-25-0180, there are two lamps installed in the lavatory dome- light housing assembly, but only the lamp in reference must be replaced. The other lamp is not energized. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 24-60-00/1 S.B.145-25-0180 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 Lavatory D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Lavatory I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the RH electrical-power control/distribution box (AMM SDS 24-60-00/1), open the LAVATORY circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it (Location Tip: RB SERVBUS/LAVATORY). (2) On the circuit breaker panel, open the LIGHTS circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it (Location Tip: DC BUS 1/LAVATORY/LIGHTS). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-28-01 Page 2 of 13 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) With the palm of your hand push and turn the lens metal frame (2) counterclockwise to remove it. (2) Remove the lamp (3) from the light housing assembly (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-28-01 Page 3 of 13 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: PRE-MOD. S.B. 145-25-0180 Lavatory Dome-Light Lamp - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 272 B C DET. A 1. LIGHT HOUSING ASSEMBLY DET. B 3. LAMP 2. LENS DET. C 145AMM330168.MCE B EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-28-01 Page 4 of 13 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: POST-MOD. S.B. 145-25-0180 Lavatory Dome-Light Lamp - Removal/Installation Figure 402 A ZONE 272 B C DET. A 1. LIGHT HOUSING ASSEMBLY DET. B 3. LAMP 2. LENS DET. C 145AMM330335.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-28-01 Page 5 of 13 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-28-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. LAVATORY DOME-LIGHT LAMP - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure for the installation of the lavatory dome-light lamp. (2) On aircraft PRE-MOD. S.B.145-25-0180, there are two lamps in the lavatory dome-light housing assembly, but only the lamp in reference must be replaced. The other lamp is not energized. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 24-60-00/1 AMM TASK 33-28-00-700-801-A/500 LAVATORY LIGHTS - OPERATIONAL TEST S.B.145-25-0180 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 Lavatory D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Lavatory I. Installation (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the lamp (3) in the light housing assembly (1). (2) With the palm of your hand push and turn the lens metal frame (2) clockwise to install it. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-28-01 Page 6 of 13 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the RH electrical-power control/distribution box (AMM SDS 24-60-00/1), close the LAVATORY circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it (Location Tip: RB SERVBUS/LAVATORY). (2) On the circuit breaker panel, close the LIGHTS circuit breaker and remove the DO- NOT-CLOSE tag from it (Location Tip: DC BUS 1/LAVATORY/LIGHTS). (3) Do the Lavatory Lights test ( AMM TASK 33-28-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-28-01 Page 7 of 13 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-28-01-000-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 4. LAVATORY DOME-LIGHT ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to remove the lavatory dome-light assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 24-60-00/1 S.B.145-25-0180 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 Lavatory D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Lavatory I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) On the RH electrical-power control/distribution box (AMM SDS 24-60-00/1), open the LAVATORY circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it (Location Tip: RB SERVBUS/LAVATORY). (2) On the circuit breaker panel, open the LIGHTS circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it (Location Tip: DC BUS 1/LAVATORY/LIGHTS). J. Removal (Figure 403) (Figure 404) SUBTASK 020-003-A (1) On aircraft PRE-MOD. S.B.145-25-0180, refer to Figure 403 to remove the Lavatory Dome-Light Assembly, as follows: EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 33-28-01 Page 8 of 13 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (a) With the palm of your hand push and turn the lens metal frame (3) counterclockwise to remove it. (b) Remove the three screws (2) and three washers (4). (c) Carefully pull the light housing assembly (1). (d) Slide the protective sleeve (6) to get access to the two terminal lugs (5). (e) Remove the two screws (8) and two washers (7) that attach the two terminal lugs (5) to the light housing assembly (1). (f) Remove the light housing assembly (1). (2) On aircraft POST-MOD. S.B.145-25-0180, refer to Figure 404 to remove the Lavatory Dome-Light Assembly, as follows: (a) With the palm of your hand push and turn the lens metal frame (7) counterclockwise to remove it. (b) Remove the three screws (6) and three washers (5). (c) Carefully pull the light housing assembly (4). (d) Slide the protective sleeve (11) to get access to the terminal lug (3). (e) Remove the screw (1) and washer (2) that attach the terminal lug (3) to the light housing assembly (4). (f) Remove the screw (10) and washer (9) that attach the terminal lug (8) to the light housing assembly (4). (g) Remove the light housing assembly (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 33-28-01 Page 9 of 13 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: PRE-MOD. S.B. 145-25-0180 Lavatory Dome-Light Assembly - Removal/Installation Figure 403 B DET. A A ZONE 272 1. LIGHT HOUSING ASSEMBLY 8. SCREW (2) 7. WASHER (2) 6. PROTECTIVE SLEEVE 2. SCREW (3) 5. TERMINAL LUG (2) 4. WASHER (3) DET. B 3. LENS 145AMM330169.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 33-28-01 Page 10 of 13 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: POST-MOD. S.B. 145-25-0180 Lavatory Dome-Light Assembly - Removal/Installation Figure 404 A ZONE 272 B DET. A 11. PROTECTIVE SLEEVE 1. SCREW 10. SCREW 2. WASHER 9. WASHER 3. TERMINAL LUG 8. TERMINAL LUG 4. LIGHT HOUSING ASSEMBLY 5. WASHER (3) 6. SCREW (3) 7. LENS DET. B 145AMM330336.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 33-28-01 Page 11 of 13 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details. GND

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-28-01-400-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 5. LAVATORY DOME-LIGHT ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure for the installation of the lavatory dome-light assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 24-60-00/1 AMM TASK 33-28-00-700-801-A/500 LAVATORY LIGHTS - OPERATIONAL TEST S.B.145-25-0180 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 Lavatory D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Lavatory I. Installation (Figure 403) (Figure 404) SUBTASK 420-003-A (1) On aircraft PRE-MOD. S.B.145-25-0180, refer to (Figure 403) to install the Lavatory Dome-Light Assembly, as follows: (a) Install the two screws (8) and two washers (7) that attach the two terminal lugs (5) to the light housing assembly (1). (b) Slide the protective sleeve (6) to cover the two terminal lugs (5). (c) Carefully put the light housing assembly (1) in its installation position. (d) Install the three screws (2) and three washers (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 33-28-01 Page 12 of 13 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (e) With the palm of your hand push and turn the lens metal frame (3) clockwise to install it. (2) On aircraft POST-MOD. S.B.145-25-0180, refer to (Figure 404) to install the Lavatory Dome-Light Assembly, as follows: (a) Install the screw (10) and washer (9) that attach the terminal lug (8) to the light housing assembly (4). (b) Install the screw (1) and washer (2) that attach the terminal lug (3) to the light housing assembly (4). (c) Slide the protective sleeve (11) to cover the terminal lug (3). (d) Carefully put the light housing assembly (4) in its installation position. (e) Install the three screws (6) and three washers (5). (f) With the palm of your hand push and turn the lens metal frame (3) clockwise to install it. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) On the RH electrical-power control/distribution box (AMM SDS 24-60-00/1), close the LAVATORY circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it (Location Tip: RB SERVBUS/LAVATORY). (2) On the circuit breaker panel, close the LIGHTS circuit breaker and remove the DO- NOT-CLOSE tag from it (Location Tip: DC BUS 1/LAVATORY/LIGHTS). (3) Do the Lavatory Lights test ( AMM TASK 33-28-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 33-28-01 Page 13 of 13 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
